meanings.definition: Deriving pleasure from one's own pain or humiliation.
meanings.sent1: She has a masochistic tendency to enjoy watching sad movies.
meanings.sent2: His masochistic behavior was evident when he chose to run a marathon despite hating running.
meanings.sent3: The masochistic cat kept playing with the cactus despite getting pricked every time.
meanings.sent4: Her masochistic love for spicy food was like willingly stepping into a fire.
meanings.sent5: The masochistic thrill-seeker enjoyed bungee jumping off tall bridges.

meanings.definition: Showing or characterized by a tendency to derive pleasure from one's own pain or humiliation.
meanings.sent1: The masochistic villain enjoyed seeing the hero suffer.
meanings.sent2: Her masochistic tendencies were evident in her choice of extreme sports.
meanings.sent3: The masochistic clown kept squirting himself in the face with water for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The masochistic storm seemed to revel in the destruction it caused.
meanings.sent5: The masochistic artist found joy in painting with his own blood.
